sentences.en: Cats rely on stealth to catch their prey.
sentences.cn: 猫科动物靠偷袭捕捉猎物。

sentences.en: He claimed Tony Blair is trying to get us into the euro by stealth.
sentences.cn: 他声称托尼·布莱尔正试图神不知鬼不觉地让我们加入欧元体系。

sentences.en: He obtained the letter by stealth.
He prefers to do good by stealth.
In the movie Stealth, Wentworth was the voice of EDI.
sentences.cn: 在电影《绝密飞行》中, went是EDI的 配音.

sentences.en: In time , these incidents only made her better at concealment and stealth.
sentences.cn: 就是这些小动作,练就这只小花豹,更好的躲藏,以及偷袭之术吧.

sentences.en: It is fun eating by stealth without being found.
sentences.cn: 偷吃而不被人发现很有趣.

sentences.en: It's good that he used direct taxation rather than stealth taxes to raise the money.
sentences.cn: 还好他采用了直接征税而不是间接征税的手段来筹集资金。

sentences.en: Richard Nixon ran his staff by stealth.
sentences.cn: 理查德-尼克松则用秘密手段操纵其幕僚.

sentences.en: Summon them right where you think the Stealth unit and presto!
sentences.cn: 把他们直接召唤到你认为有隐形单位的地方.

sentences.en: The most striking was the way that used stealth.
sentences.cn: 最了不起的是运用隐形飞机的方式.

sentences.en: Then the radiometer antenna temperature of coating stealth material was modeled.
sentences.cn: 在此基础上建立了涂层隐身材料的辐射计天线温度模型.

sentences.en: They achieved their original dominance by stealth.
sentences.cn: 他们原先的优势是暗中取得的.

sentences.en: When at last we met alone it was by stealth.
sentences.cn: 最后我们单独见面的时候,那是秘密的.

sentences.en: Why do you slip away by stealth like this?
sentences.cn: 你怎么这样就偷偷地溜了?

words.tran_cn: 偷窃；贼赃；偷垒（棒球比赛中的犯规行为）
剽窃；偷偷地做；偷窃；vi. 窃取；偷偷地行动；偷垒；n. 偷窃；便宜货；偷垒；断球

trans.tran_cn: 秘密行动，鬼祟，隐形，潜入
trans.tran_en: when you do something very quietly, slowly or secretly, so that no one notices you
